system.description:
Your skin hardens into tough tree bark. Your AC becomes 14 (18 on a critical spellcasting check) for the spell's duration.

You take double damage from fire while you are under the spell's effects.

@UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.spell-effects.Item.7GAeLAX0xl65gxer]{Spell Effect: Barkskin}
